content:
I am getting this message below when doing a full build (partial build works ok) - is it only me?

     [java] Error: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HL7\FHIR\build\temp\profiles-types-r3.xml (The requested operation cannot be performed on a file with a user-mapped section open)
     [java] java.lang.Exception: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HL7\FHIR\build\temp\profiles-types-r3.xml (The requested operation cannot be performed on a file with a user-mapped section open)
cleaned my local folders and it runs fine now
